animeTitle: Sign in to the Ancient Saint Body at the beginning
otherNames: Kaiju Qiandao Huanggu Sheng Ti, Kāijú Qiāndào Huānggǔ Shèng Tǐ, Scoring the Sacred Body of the Ancients from the Get-go, Sign-in at the Start With the Ancient Holy Body, Signing Into the Desolate Ancient Holy Body in the Beginning, Start by signing in and
synopsis: Jun Xiaoyao traveled through the fantasy world and became the son of God of an ancient family. He possessed an invincible background, amazing talent, and even obtained a sign-in system. At the beginning, he signed in with a highly accomplished ancient holy body, and with the help of the system, he stepped towards the top of the world step by step!
